alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lowndes; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 4:48PM CDT until April 27 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... Central Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pheba, or 8 miles northwest of Starkville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Griffith around 510 PM CDT. Muldrow around 530 PM CDT. West Point and Tibbee around 540 PM CDT. Waverly around 545 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
